text: George Gregory Nelmark (May 9, 1917 – December 4, 2010), born George Nelimarkka, was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Toledo Jim White Chevrolets (1941–42) and Syracuse Nationals (1946–48) and averaged 5.3 points per game for his career. == References == Category:1917 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Amateur Athletic Union men's basketball players Category:American men's basketball players Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Basketball players from Michigan Category:Guards (basketball) Category:High school basketball coaches in the United States Category:People from Ironwood, Michigan Category:Sportspeople from Santa Barbara, California Category:Syracuse Nationals players Category:Toledo Jim White Chevrolets players Category:Truman Bulldogs men's basketball players Category:University of California, Santa Barbara alumni
title: George Nelmark
